website_summaries.verdict: A stylish jewelry box that holds plenty without taking up too much space.
pros: Clever design features 2 trays with a generous assortment of compartments in varying sizes to fit just about any piece of jewelry
Elegant, classy, and highly functional, right down to the decorative magnetic clasp
Beautiful packaging makes this great for gifting, too
cons: With ribbons holding the lid in place, removing the upper tray can be awkward

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have had it for several months and I think it is sooo worth the price. The quality is better than I expected, very durable outside, soft inside, well constructed, good size. I use this everyday and really enjoy it. I do not have that much jewelry so I can for everything with room. If you have a lot of jewelry it may be too small. See my photos to help. I would buy this for a friend and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, well-made box,  necklace storage lacking
customer_reviews.text: Outstandingly well made (!!!!)....only issue is that they placed a mirror where users would be better served had they placed necklace hooks and a skirt of fabric to secure them. There simply is not enough necklace space, and placing more than one in a slot risks tangling. It’s disappointing that they didn’t take the opportunity for hanging space. After trying to figure out a way to ingeniously add hanging space, I finally returned it for a much lower quality box (ugh) that managed to hold more.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this jewelry box!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve researched many jewelry boxes and I’m so happy I chose this one. First of all, it’s gorgeous and very well made. Doesn’t look cheap like some items like this. So many compartments that fit all my jewelry and I like that you can see everything laid out when you open it. No drawers to have to look through. The mirror adds a very classy touch. I thought I wanted the boxes that have the necklace hangers but it’s totally not needed. This would make an excellent gift. Come in a gift box already. Don’t hesitate. This is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product
customer_reviews.text: Well made product and fits on my bathroom counter top. Would have liked that they made a slightly smaller one available though. It's well worth the money and my jewelry is organized. I don't have to hunt for anything; it's all there in the compartments. A hint for others: I use tiny plastic bags to keep my chains separated and untangled. The bags are actually for pills and usually can find them in the drug/pill section of the store. I also use these bags for dog treats to put in my pocket so my pants don't get dirty (especially is the treat has any oil in the ingredients)-- works great.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! Worth all my research on tons of jewelry leather storage boxes on Amazon. It’s spacious. Compartment sizes make sense. The mirror is super big which you don’t see in most other similar products. Only down side - IMPORTANT - there’s no lock. Your child could mess with it if that’s a concern for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: hhvv

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: Nice construction with plenty of storage space, only drawl back no place to store necklaces. The little compartments work but the chain easily becomes dangled, even more if you store 2 necklaces per box.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for sorting a variety of jewelry, elegant case
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jewelry box, good quality and looks elegant. I bought this for jewelry that I don't wear often, so I didn't want a box with drawers because I couldn't store that in my closet. This has plenty of compartments of different sizes for different types of jewelry (earrings, rings, necklaces, bracelets), and a good assortment of each size. The tray is easy to lift out. Like others, I left the foam covering the mirror because I don't need the mirror. It's made out of a synthetic material so I don't know how it will wear (will it peel with time, etc) but for now everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: SBette

customer_reviews.title: Great Jewlry Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great box, quality is so pretty inside and out. Got my husband a similar box and we have them out on our dresser in his and hers fashion. Keeps long necklaces tidy and plenty of room for earrings and bracelets. Overall, for a nice, clean and simple storage solution this worked out wonderfully for us. Would highly recommend as a gift item, it's really packaged beautifully and felt like a special gift for myself when I opened it up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful jewelry box!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jewelry box for my daughter-in-law as a Christmas present. The glowing reviews that I read online are truly justified! The box is gorgeous and the way in which it is packaged gives the feeling that it is much more expensive than it actually is! Since this will be a gift, I cannot comment on its durability. It looks very sturdy and well constructed so I am guessing that with care it will last many years. I think my daughter-in-law will be delighted with it - I know I am!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this sooner...
customer_reviews.text: Knowing what I know now, I can't believe I went so long without a quality jewelry box. This is a substantial, well made jewelry box, I love the satisfying "thunk" sound of closing the sturdy, weighty lid and knowing my jewelry is protected from dust and oxidation. The well organized compartments inside allow me to organize so that everything has its place and is easy to find. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunluvr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the new jewelry box! My son gave me a gift card for Mother’s Day so this is what I chose to get. The box is very well made, sturdy and it looks great sitting on my dresser. I like the added touch of the mirror. I do t care for the design of the closing mechanism, there weren’t many choices. Overall I highly recommend the box!
customer_reviews.author: jeannie pyron

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product.  Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This lovely jewelry box is so much better than I expected! It looks as if it costs twice what I paid. Very roomy and the stitching on the black faux leather is superb. This is packaged beautifully. Wrapped in a soft casing, placed in a heavy weight gift box. Very classy presentation. The corner of my internal gift box was smashed in (not the outer brown Amazon box) but it didn't damage the actual jewelry box, although I would not have wanted a gift recipient to receive it like that. I would recommend the product very highly.
customer_reviews.author: joan humphreys

customer_reviews.title: I opened the box to find the jewelry box nestled in a beautiful gift box along with a lovely thank you card ...
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a jewelry box locally and not finding what I wanted, I pulled up Amazon and started to do some research. After 2 days of looking and review reading, I finally selected a leather jewelry box from Glenor. The box arrived in 2 days, as promised. I opened the box to find the jewelry box nestled in a beautiful gift box along with a lovely thank you card from Glenor. The pictures truly do not do justice to this lovely item and there is plenty of room for lots of different types of jewelry items. I would highly recommend this item, and I'm extremely picky.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Veal

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: All's I can say is.. Wow. I read reviews on this product and that is what made my decision to purchase. As previously stated, the packaging was amazing. There was no way that this was getting damaged in route.. ever. It is very sturdy. Holds a lot of jewelry it it's own compartments too, so no more tangled chains! Great job !
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great jewelry box, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is stunning and well made for the price. Accommodates plenty and force me to clean up out the ugly plastic craft case I’d been storing earrings & such for years. Arrived in beautiful packaging with a thank you note. My costume jewelry is now neat, organized and easy to find. Looks beautiful on my chest of drawers. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Keeps track of everything!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what i was looking for! Space for earrings, bracelets, necklaces, and rings. Fits a lot of items, but is easy to see what you have also. Does look very stylish as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jewelry box to organize my pieces and it did not disappoint. The jewelry box is just as described and matches the photo. It's sturdy and solid, and the spaces for the jewelry are sized well. It stays open when I want it to, and when it's closed, it's beautiful and the magnetic latch works great. Great jewelry box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This box is very pretty and has a lot of compartments and a soft interior. It snaps shut. I wanted a jewelry box that I could display if I wanted to but that would be easy to pack away when needed, and this one definitely works. There's more than enough room for my jewelry, and the sections allow for grouping sets easily. It arrived very quickly and even the outer packaging was appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee this great quality jewelry box! Super organized now!
customer_reviews.text: Love loveee this jewelry box!! Fits all my jewelry with Great organization ! I'm the type of person who likes to see everything at once and then choose rather than having to open 10 drawers or boxes to see what I want to wear. If you're like me this is perfect for you! The small dividers work gray even for multiple earrings and multiple small necklaces! 2 levels helps me organize with everyday wear vs party/going out wear ! Quality is really good. It is not cheap material. Buckle on front is real cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Maninder Gandhi

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry box! I was hesitant to order and hoped to find one less expensive, but after reading the good reviews, I took a chance. I am so happy I did. First of all, it arrived nicely packaged and even in a gift box. It is attractive and holds everything I needed it to hold. I was able to get rid of three different jewelry holders and combine all my jewelry into this beautiful box.
customer_reviews.author: SallyB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend for her birthday and she absolutely loved it! From the beautiful presentation, to the excellent quality, this jewelry box is ELEGANT! Well made with lots of room and versatility and the box is just beautiful, has a substantial feel to it, LOVE the class and materials used. Just a really beautiful quality jewelry box and for the price I wasn't expecting all the extras. This looks great setting out, I'm probably going to be getting one for myself. Love it and definitely recommend buying this, you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Truly Fine Craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: Jewelry boxes from Glenor Co. are works of fine craftsmanship and attention to quality and detail. Even the boxes they come in are beautiful!! You will keep this for life and pass it down. They make great gifts and the prices are amazing for the product you receive. You can feel confident ordering one or more of these jewelry boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Tobye Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is perfect if you don't have a lot of jewelry or not a lot of space! I still have it after 3 years and it is in good condition because I keep it in a cupboard. It has good craftsmanship and none of the fuzzy stuff has rubbed off in 3 years!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: My order came broken, the outside amazon box was fine but the jewelry box was inside of a decorative box, the side had fallen off, the jewelry box was fine until I totally opened it and the mirror was shattered. It was all encased in bubble wrap ao I’m not sure how it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Totally Happy With It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this jewelry box is big enough for everyday yet I can throw it in my suitcase so that I don't have to worry about messy jewelry getting tangled up or looking super cheesy putting jewelry in Ziploc bags. The mirror is a great addition an the cushions inside make my jewelry feel like they finally have a resting place. Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: WoK

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, well designed quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mother-in-law. She had to recently downsize, so her jewelry got downsized as well. My first impression was very good. This is a classy and well constructed item. A bit hefty for it's size, but that tells me it won't fall apart, either. Very good compartmentalization. And, best of all, she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Prodigal Knot

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price point.  Comes in nice box too!
customer_reviews.text: Really great jewelry box. Nice leather like case, roomy, easily stores in drawer or beneath cabinet. I use it in addition to my jewelry armoire. Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product and it fits nicely in my standard size (between-the-studs) wall safe.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product. Well made. Nice layout with a decent array of compartments. While this is nice enough to display on your vanity, I wanted something small enough to organize all my good jewelry so I could put it in my wall safe. I keep the costume stuff in another box, so burglars won't walk away empty handed :). I highly recommend this product. There are other sizes available depending on your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Uglider

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Box
customer_reviews.text: I really did not believe the other reviews saying how beautiful this box is. I purchased anyway, and oh my gosh it really is gorgeous. It is obviously well made and holds a good amount of jewelry. It also comes in nice packaging that makes it great for giving as a gift. My only complaint is that some of my watch faces are too wide for the section meant for watches, so they lie at an angle. This is a great jewelry box for the price 👍
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a jewel box that holds multiple bracelets and rings. I love it! I someone orders this and has large cuff bracelets as well as the regular clasp bracelets, this is the one to get. The only thing I didn't like was that for jewelry fanatics, it needs to be a little wider. Other than that, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Pennucci

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, holds more than you would expect!
customer_reviews.text: Before buying, my jewelry was spread out among 2 small boxes and a necklace tree. My husband and I plan to live-a-board our boat soon so I needed something compact that can be stowed in a small space and, doesn't scream "I'm a jewelry box steal me!" This box is perfect in every way and holds all my jewelry. When searching for a box, I found all had WAY too many slots for rings and not enough for other jewelry. This is the right balance of space for earrings, necklaces and bracelets.
customer_reviews.author: Jevon Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: The jewelry box is perfect. Nice size. Not too small and not huge. Fits nicely where I keep it. Lots of individual storage areas. Some long and some square good for all my jewelry. The box is well made and looks very good. I’m extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JMBerry

customer_reviews.title: high quality and good looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage daughter and was very impressed with the quality. It is nice leather and really beautiful. Great value. It is well designed to hold all types of jewelry. She loves it and I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Toigo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful jewelry box that is well made and functionable. It hold a lot of pieces and very easy to see each piece displayed. Very glad I purchased it. Also would purchase for a gift.. nicely done.
customer_reviews.author: E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 year old granddaughter to store her jewelry and she loves it. Feels like quality craftsmanship. Nice leather outside.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little jewelry boc
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large jewelry armoire... a piece of furniture really. I find having a small box on my bureau very handy to put the things I use day to day... watch, earrings, rings, etc. This lovely box fits the bill perfectly. Nicely made; leather is nice, and the lining is lovely. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: RosaInGlousta

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: The jewelry box that I purchased was a gift for a friend's birthday. She absolutely loved it and so did the other three women who were at dinner with us. It's very well made and looks to be much more expensive then the actual price. To be honest, I had a hard time giving the jewelry box away. I will probably be purchasing another one in the future, but this time, it will be for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marion H Crowley

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite items that I've purchased from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite items that I've purchased from Amazon. I needed something to organize my jewelry and this immediately popped up. I figured it was too good to be true that I wanted to purchase the first search result, but it had great reviews, looked aesthetically pleasing, looked spacious, and I figured, "Let's try it!" I'm so glad I did. It looks exactly like it does in the photographs. The construction and quality of materials are great. It fits nicely in one of my bathroom drawers and it is soo much easier now to find what I am looking for when I am trying to add a little something to an outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted! This jewelry box far exceeded my expectations ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted! This jewelry box far exceeded my expectations and the price was unbelievable. I just looked at similar boxes in the mall yesterday all priced $200 and higher. I've been using a Lori G armoire with mirror for several years and am just tired of its bulkiness. This leather box is sleek and classy. I'll probably have to order another to fit everything, but it is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box
customer_reviews.text: I really like that the box is not only gorgeous but hold (almost) everything. It doesn't have height or capacity for chunky jewelry, but that's okay since it works well for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality material and a great gift! My girlfriend loves it and she definitely needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Pifer

customer_reviews.title: A Wow Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was on a Christmas wish list for one of our family members and she loved it. Wow this was so well made and packaged beautifully. Thanks so much for offering such a quality product! I will definitely recommend 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jewelry case, well-organized compartments for earrings, rings and necklaces. Low profile means I can keep it on a shelf in my closet and still open it. Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Julia S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three different jewelry boxes in this line and they are fabulous as a combination! The material was lovely; the value for the $$ spent was terrific and my jewelry is so organized that I can actually find a single pair of earrings immediately, rather than searching through a pile.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine G. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fancy! It holds all my jewelry and it looks elegant, neat and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great design, quality, and service.
customer_reviews.text: I got this jewelry box as a birthday gift for my granddaughter and she loves it. The design is great for holding her special jewelry, the quality is very fine, and it arrived quickly and well packaged. I look forward to purchasing other gifts from this company, knowing the items will be enjoyed for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Baltimore Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jewelry box. It has so many compartments. As soon as it arrived, and it arrived quickly, I immediately transferred all of my jewerly into it. It is sturdy and the mirror is great because you can see the earrings as you try them on. It sits right on my dresser and holds everything. I love this and would recommend it to anyone who needs a jewelry box. Very well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: sabrid2

customer_reviews.title: That's some high quality H2O...
customer_reviews.text: She is in love with this box. Perfect amount of room for someone starting their collection. Plenty of room the add more. Exceptional quality in the products used for construction, she ouuld last years and years. Highly recommend you grab one also.
customer_reviews.author: AAron

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas and she loves it plenty of room for what she has
customer_reviews.author: Fielding Isaacs jr

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with the quality and value of this purchase I immediately ordered a second one! Very nice jewelry box with mirror in lid and lift-out drawer for second area of storage. An excellent value for the price. Nicely packaged and promptly delivered. I was pleasantly surprised to receive a thank you note from vendor for my purchase. Good for teen or adult use.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love this box and it is PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Love this box and it is PERFECT!! I liked this box so much I ordered it as a Birthday gift for my step-sister. It is just beautiful and well made. Great quality and the color is rich and just beautiful. It came in such nice packaging and that impressed me with sending as a gift. I highly recommend this product and think it is a great gift for any woman!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd taken a photo of my dresser top before I got this item. The clutter of old jewelry containers and small earring boxes was a mess. Plus, I could never find what I wanted. Now everything fits in this well-organized jewelry box and my dresser looks great! I rarely write reviews, but this is one of my best Amazon purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Joanegar

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and attractive jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Different size and shape divisions for jewelry, 2 levels, mirror in the back, quite lovely. Packaging was top notch and item was received in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Quality, and well built!
customer_reviews.text: I can't add anything to the reviews that have already been posted. It was well packaged for shipping and my wife loved it and furthermore it is a perfect size for the motorhome!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Myhre

customer_reviews.title: I love the jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I love the jewelry box! It has so many compartments that it makes it so easy to find just what I want to wear. I have it sitting on top of a fantastic metal stand I found at Home Goods. I purchased magnet hooks to attach to the sides to hang my longer necklaces. ...Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this box based on prior reviews. It did not disappoint - the box is very well made and looks great. I used it for all of my "fancy" jewelry (lol) that I want to hide from my kids. This box has a good combination of small compartments and larger compartments for necklaces, bracelets, etc. As other reviewers mentioned the box came in a very nice outer box and with a card. I am considering buying more to give as gifts, since I like mine so much!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Suozzo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this jewelry box. It is pretty on my dresser and keeps my jewelry very organized and accessible. This is my second one. The first one I purchased was just for earrings. I liked it so well, I ordered this one for bracelets and chains.
customer_reviews.author: hijenk4

customer_reviews.title: Great box for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great jewelry box for the price. I looked at a lot of boxes and chose this one for the compartments that it has. It fits my needs very well. It came well packaged and quickly to my door. It is a large size but not overly so. The mirror inside the lid is useful for me as well. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my jewelry perfectly and organized. Exactly what I needed. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Browneyez Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Great for 12 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 12 year old daughter and she really likes it. It makes it easy for her to organize her earrings and bracelets now that she has newly pierced ears. It looks nice in her room and functions well, as advertised. She wishes it had more necklace space, if pressed for a con.
customer_reviews.author: K. Piercy

customer_reviews.title: Has a easy and nice looking lock
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Sharp looking and well made and was able to accommodate all my jewelry in one box rather than multiple boxes. Has a easy and nice looking lock. The mirror is a nice touch. Overall I am very pleased with the purchase and was packaged in a nice box when I received. Definitely would recommend to anyone looking for a jewelry box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent value for the money. Lots of storage and individual areas for rings and earrings. Not too big or small. Cons: The plastic that covers the mirror was very difficult to get off. Took forever to remove it. Once removed, love this Jewelry Box.
customer_reviews.author: bokuno

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought the jewelry box as a Christmas gift for my daughter. The box is of very nice quality and is packed very nicely in a gift box. It looks expensive, exterior looks & feels like leather. Inside is a beautiful tan velvet with specific space for rings, earrings, bracelets, necklaces & more. VERY impressed and so was my daughter! Thank you for a nice quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is beautiful! Exceptional quality, stylish, classy, holds a nice amount of jewelry, and comes in a really nice gift box. I was skeptical purchasing this, even with all of the great reviews, but am happy I decided to get it. Picture doesn't do it justice. Worth every penny, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joann A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice well constructed jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to replace 3 smaller jewelry boxes. He doesn't have a lot of watches but does have quit a few smaller items like lapel pins, rings etc. This box is perfect for him. The box is very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item more than a year ago and I have no complains. I open it almost every day at least in the morning and evening and it is in the same state as when I first got it. I like its size and appearance. The inner material is soft and pleasant for the touch, but it doesn't collect much dust. So I am considering to buy their box for the watches.
customer_reviews.author: Anoush

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my granddaughters for Christmas. They arrived in elegant, quality boxes. The workmanship is outstanding and they loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie L

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and somewhat elegant. Really glad I chose it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry box! Perfect for the top of my dresser, and very nice, high-quality item. Comes packaged very nicely - would make a great gift. Really sort of elegant. I've tried a number of other jewelry organizers for a few years, but I like going back to this old-school style. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KAWSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my better half. She absolutely loved it. Her words - "Best she ever haf"
customer_reviews.author: Rangeral

customer_reviews.title: Nice box and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a new jewelry box for a while now and am pleased to have found this one. I love the decorative clasp on the front of the box!!1
customer_reviews.author: VAR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the jewelry box from presentation to usage. It is perfect for giving as a gift as the packaging is very nice. I often wonder how a product is going to be packaged when it arrives and this one arrives beautifully. The space is not huge but has two trays and keeps my nicer things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Gift
customer_reviews.text: Jewelry box exceeded expectations. Arrived carefully packed in a nice gift box. Handsome black leather with cream-colored interior. Lots of space and sections for jewelry, including ring slots. Nice, smooth movement of lid and the top section lifts out easily. The mirror and the metal snap clasp are protected in easily removable plastic. Overall, a great value for the price. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: You will like this jewlery box.
customer_reviews.text: Reviews are right, this is a very nice jewlery box. I wish it came with three trays instead of two. The small compartments are great for not just earrings, but necklace/earring sets too if the charms are small. Some say the small sections are too small, but I have to say they are not too small at all, and very handy over the larger sections keeping items separated. I am glad I chose to order this box over some others.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cantrell

customer_reviews.author: Roberta L.

customer_reviews.title: I love the size
customer_reviews.text: I love the size...not too small, not big and bulky. The 2 trays hold everything I need to hold...small square compartments hold earrings, medium square compartments are great for bracelets, pins, or bigger sized earrings. The rectangular compartments are great for necklaces. Laying necklaces in the compartment helps prevent chains tangling and getting knotted. And of course the ring compartment easily holds 10 rings. The design was well thought out. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Cocco

customer_reviews.title: Great Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is perfect for my jewelry. It is made very nice and for the size it has room for quite a bit of jewelry. It was packaged with perfection.. The inside is soft and has two little ribbons to lift the top holder. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a jewelry box.

customer_reviews.title: I just purchased my second Glenor Co Jewely Box I love them that much
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews however I feel that this is an exception. I just purchased my second Glenor Co Jewely Box I love them that much. We are moving and I searched everywhere for a jewelry "container" that would store, organize and keep my jewelry safe while we travel and are in transition. This not only met my exceptions but I also was pleasantly surprised on the quality of the box, it is constructed very well and the bonus is the fact that it is a beautiful leather that I will continue to use in my new home!

product_meta.title: Glenor Co 28 Section Jewelry Box - 2 Layer - Buckle Snap & Magnet Closure - Large Mirror - Leather Design - Black - Jewelry Organizer for Women & Girls - Holder for Earring Ring Necklace & Bracelet
feature_bullets: 28 UNIQUE COMPARTMENTS - This Jewelry Box has 28 compartments of various sizes and shapes to keep all types of jewelry organized and neatly displayed from necklaces, bracelets and rings to earrings and watches, never lose your jewelry again.

EASY & MODERN CLOSURE: Our exclusive snap and magnet mechanism covered with an elegant buckle is specially designed for easy use and allows you to easily open your jewelry box even when operating with one hand ,closes firmly so it never opens by itself.

COMPACT DESIGN: Designed to sit on your dresser without using too much precious space, this compact designed patented jewelry box comes with 2 trays, one on top of the other, the box measures 10.25 Inches wide 10.25 Inches in the length and 3.5 Inches in the height.

HIGH QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Built with high quality PU leather on the outside, soft elegant velvet on the inside, well done seams and a built in mirror, this jewelry box has a modern look yet it is sturdy and long lasting, keeps your jewelry organized and elegant.

GREAT GIFT IDEA: Packaged in an elegant gift box also includes a blank gift card this unique, elegant and luxurious design makes it the perfect gift for your loved one i.e. mother, girlfriend, wife, daughter, colleague, or friend, gift her with the best, she will thank you forever.
